underlying_goal: To edit and improve a written application (`todo/eag-2026.md`) for clarity, persuasiveness, and friendliness.
primary_success: Successfully rewrote an application to be more confident and compelling by replacing vague language with specific details and reframing the user's background as an asset.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to edit a draft application for persuasiveness. Claude rewrote the text to sound more confident and specific, referencing a content library for context. After the user provided additional key information (funding from UK AISI), Claude successfully integrated it to further strengthen the application.
